eu.monnetproject.lemon.model

Interface Node

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LemonElement, LemonElementOrPredicate
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NodeImpl

    public interface Node
extends LemonElement
    A node in a phrase structure tree
    Author:
    John McCrae
